name: Bridon
description: Bridon Industries is a custom hydraulic solutions manufacturing company based in Shakopee, Minnesota. The project included a responsive desktop/mobile design, a few front-end scripts for the UI, and the usage of prescribed design assets.

name: Dons HWL
description: Don Colston is an enthusiast for hollow wire lighting. His website is clean and simple: it consists of some basic information about his hobby and live photo galleries of his creations.

name: Which Wallet
description: Which Wallet is a service that helps you find the perfect bitcoin wallet based on your requirements regarding security, usability, and principle. Project discontinued due to lack of donations.

name: Mecono
description: Mecono is a hardware/protocol level project that enables P2P internet access using trustless discovery of how isolated nodes are connected and the indirect paths through the mesh between nodes.

name: Jottico
description: Jottico is a simple markdown-based notetaking app. Project discontinued due to lack of users.

name: Tock
description: A simple, terminal-based, clock for Linux computers written in C++ and shell.

name: Pinhead
description: Web-UI for accessing images that have been pinned to the (highly experimental) Interplanetary File System network (IPFS).

name: Porthodlio
description: Simple, lightweight, open source Java application to track cryptocurrency assets and profits.
